casebody.data:
FIRE ASSOCIATION OF PHILADELPHIA, Plaintiff in Error, v. Fred BAHR, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 21, 1924.) No. 181. Wing & Wing, of New York City (James G. Purdy, of Ne.w York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Sydney Rosenthal, of Long Island City, N. Y. (Sydney Rosenthal, of Long Island City, N. Y., and Edward U. Green, of Carona, N. Y., of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
